credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for Ceiling with Aurora as the Central Motif
medium: Pen and dark brown and black ink, brush and dark wash on paper.
description: Central oblong supported by trapezia. Genii alternate with leaves in latter. Color notations: "Coroni/ Verdi", "ale giale"; "..(?)/Fossa."  Oblong surrounded by strips with ornament. Color notations: "rosso"; "darchia"; "ornati diari..(?)". Inscribed in oblong circular medallion in which Aurora represented. Laterally, putti facing short sides. Verso: rough pencil sketches, ink scribbling. Inscriptions illegible, most likely not Giani.
name: Drawing
